metadata.title: CVE-2022-2602 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - high.
metadata.description:
io_uring UAF, Unix SCM garbage collection David Bouman and Billy Jheng Bing Jhong discovered that a race condition existed in the io_uring subsystem in the Linux kernel, leading to a use- after-free vulnerability. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2602` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-23.24
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic-64k - 5.19.0-23.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1028-aws - 5.19.0-1011.12
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1029-azure - 5.19.0-1010.11
No subscription required

advisory.discovered_by: David Bouman and Billy Jheng Bing Jhong working with Trend Micro's Zero Day Initiative
